mapper.select: SELECT A1.CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , A1.CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ , A1.SELL_TP_CD /*판매유형코드*/ , A1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD /*판매유형상세코드*/ , A1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD /*계약상세상태코드*/ FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL A1 WHERE A1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*데이터삭제여부*/ AND A1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND A1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}

SELECT T.CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , T.CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ , T.BASE_PD_CD /*기준상품코드*/ , T.SELL_TP_CD /*판매유형코드*/ , T.SELL_TP_DTL_CD /*판매유형상세코드*/ , T.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD /*계약상세상태코드*/ , T.CNTRAM_DSC_AMT /*계약금할인금액[AS-IS:LCRAMT]*/ , T.MM_ISTM_AMT /*월할부금액[AS-IS:LCAMT1]*/ , T.DSC_AMT /*할인금액[AS-IS:LCRAM5]*/ , T.STPL_PTRM /*약정기간[AS-IS:LCGUB3]*/ , T.FRISU_BFSVC_PTRM_N /*무상BS기간수[AS-IS:LCFLG7]*/ , T.ALNCMP_CD /*제휴사코드[AS-IS:LCETC8]*/ , T.ALNC_PRTNR_DRM_VAL /*제휴파트너식별값[AS-IS:LCCK14]*/ , T.SELL_INFLW_CHNL_DTL_CD /*판매유입채널상세코드[AS-IS:LCDDPT]*/ , T.CNTR_CST_NO /*계약고객번호[AS-IS:LCKKEY]*/ , T.IST_DT /*설치일자[AS-IS:LCSLEY+LCSLEM+LCSLED]*/ , T.PD_CLSF_ID /*상품분류ID[AS-IS:LCICDE]*/ , T.CNTR_RCPDT /*계약접수일자*/ , T.KUMON_CST_IDK_VAL /*구몬고객식별키값[AS-IS:LC3490P.LCGKEY]*/ , T.CST_GD_CD /*고객등급코드[AS-IS:LCGRAD]->VIP코드가 없으면 1:일반으로 세팅*/ , T.STPL_EXN_DT /*약정만료일자=ADD_MONTHS(설치일자, 약정기간-무상BS기간수)*/ , T.PASG_DC /*경과일수(위약금산출요청일자 - 설치일자)*/ , T.CSMB_CS /*소모품비용[AS-IS:LCAMT1]*/ , T.REQD_CS /*철거비용[AS-IS:LCAMT2]*/ , T.RENTAL_RNTF /*렌탈손료*/ , T.SPAY_RNTF /*일시불손료*/ , T.RES_CCAM_RAT /*잔여위약금비율[AS-IS:LCAMT5]*/ /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/ /*리스 잔여개월수 산출 -> MONTHS_BETWEEN(약정만료일자, 입력값_요청일자) */ /* --> 사유 리스의 차월은 당월부터 증가 */ /*렌탈 잔여개월수 산출 -> MONTHS_BETWEEN(약정만료일자, 입력값_요청일자) - 1*/ /* --> 사유 렌탈의 차월은 익월부터 증가 */ /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/ , CASE WHEN T.SELL_TP_CD = '2' AND T.SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('22', '24', '25', '26') THEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(T.STPL_EXN_DT, '20230701')) ELSE TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(T.STPL_EXN_DT, '20230701')) - 1 END AS RES_MCN /*잔여개월수*/ /*렌탈 잔여일수 산출 -> 입력값_요청일자의 말일 - 입력값_요청일자*/ , CASE WHEN T.SELL_TP_CD = '2' AND T.SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('21', '23') THEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(#{rqdt}), 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(#{rqdt}, 'YYYYMMDD') ELSE 0 END AS RES_DC /*잔여일수*/ , T.PD_CLSF_ID1 /*상품분류ID-세분류[AS-IS:LCICDE]*/ FROM ( SELECT A1.CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , A1.CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ , A1.BASE_PD_CD /*기준상품코드*/ , A1.SELL_TP_CD /*판매유형코드*/ , A1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD /*판매유형상세코드*/ , A1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD /*계약상세상태코드*/ , A1.CNTRAM_DSC_AMT /*계약금할인금액[AS-IS:LCRAMT]*/ , A1.MM_ISTM_AMT /*월할부금액[AS-IS:LCAMT1]*/ , A1.DSC_AMT /*할인금액[AS-IS:LCRAM5]*/ , A1.STPL_PTRM /*약정기간[AS-IS:LCGUB3]*/ , A2.FRISU_BFSVC_PTRM_N /*무상BS기간수[AS-IS:LCFLG7]*/ , A5.ALNCMP_CD /*제휴사코드[AS-IS:LCETC8]*/ , A4.ALNC_PRTNR_DRM_VAL /*제휴파트너식별값[AS-IS:LCCK14]*/ , A3.SELL_INFLW_CHNL_DTL_CD /*판매유입채널상세코드[AS-IS:LCDDPT]*/ , A3.CNTR_CST_NO /*계약고객번호[AS-IS:LCKKEY]*/ , A2.IST_DT /*설치일자[AS-IS:LCSLEY+LCSLEM+LCSLED]*/ /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/ /*원두커피 (판단:상품소분류) PD_CLSF_ID -> '05003002' [Cooking+커피머신+원두] */ /*Face Care(판단:상품소분류) PD_CLSF_ID -> '03004001' [Body+뷰티기기+Face케어]*/ /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/ , A6.PD_CLSF_ID /*상품분류ID[AS-IS:LCICDE]*/ , SUBSTR(A3.CNTR_RCP_FSH_DTM, 1, 8) AS CNTR_RCPDT /*계약접수완료일시[AS-IS:LCCRTY+LCCRTM+LCCRTD]->사실 년월일만 사용*/ /*제휴사코드 = '33'[더오름제휴-렌탈]이면 구몬고객식별키값 -> 제휴파트너식별값*/ , CASE WHEN A5.ALNCMP_CD = '33' THEN A4.ALNC_PRTNR_DRM_VAL ELSE A2.KUMON_CST_IDK_VAL END AS KUMON_CST_IDK_VAL /*구몬고객식별키값[AS-IS:LC3490P.LCGKEY]*/ /*[기준]계약접수일자 >= '20200601' -> 고객등급코드 조회 이외 '' 처리*/ , NVL(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A3.CNTR_RCP_FSH_DTM, 1, 8) >= '20200601' THEN A7.CST_GD_CD ELSE '' END, '1') AS CST_GD_CD /*고객등급코드[AS-IS:LCGRAD]->VIP코드가 없으면 1:일반으로 세팅*/ , TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(A2.IST_DT, A1.STPL_PTRM - A2.FRISU_BFSVC_PTRM_N), 'YYYYMMDD') AS STPL_EXN_DT /*약정만료일자=ADD_MONTHS(설치일자, 약정기간-무상BS기간수)*/ , TO_DATE(#{rqdt}, 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(A2.IST_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') AS PASG_DC /*경과일수(위약금산출요청일자 - 설치일자)*/ , A8.CSMB_CS /*소모품비용[AS-IS:LCAMT1]*/ , A8.REQD_CS /*철거비용[AS-IS:LCAMT2]*/ , A8.RENTAL_RNTF /*렌탈손료*/ , A8.SPAY_RNTF /*일시불손료*/ , A8.RES_CCAM_RAT /*잔여위약금비율[AS-IS:LCAMT5]*/ /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/ /*공기청정기 (판단:상품세분류) PD_CLSF_ID -> '02001001002' [Air+공기청정기+~33㎡(10평)+7평형] */ /*웰스팜와이드(판단:상품세분류) PD_CLSF_ID -> '05001003001' [Cooking+Smart Farm+기기+Wide type]*/ /*웰스팜슬림 (판단:상품세분류) PD_CLSF_ID -> '05001003002' [Cooking+Smart Farm+기기+Slim type]*/ /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/ , A9.PD_CLSF_ID AS PD_CLSF_ID1 /*상품분류ID-세분류[AS-IS:LCICDE]*/ FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL A1 /*계약상세[AS-IS:LC3100P]*/ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL A2 /*계약WELLS상세[AS-IS:LC3100P]*/ ON A2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*데이터삭제여부*/ AND A2.CNTR_NO = A1.CNTR_NO AND A2.CNTR_SN = A1.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS A3 /*계약기본[AS-IS:LC3100P]*/ ON A3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*데이터삭제여부*/ AND A3.CNTR_NO = A1.CNTR_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_PRTNR_REL A4 /*계약파트너관계[AS-IS:LC3100P]*/ ON A4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*데이터삭제여부*/ AND A4.CNTR_NO = A3.CNTR_NO AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN A4.VL_STRT_DTM AND A4.VL_END_DTM LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_ACMPAL_CNTR_IZ A5 /*관계사제휴계약내역[AS-IS:LC3100P]*/ ON A5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*데이터삭제여부*/ AND A5.BASE_CNTR_NO = A1.CNTR_NO AND A5.BASE_CNTR_SN = A1.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_CLSF_BAS A6 /*상품분류기본-소분류[AS-IS:KA1100P]*/ ON A6.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*데이터삭제여부*/ AND A6.USE_YN = 'Y' /*사용여부*/ AND A6.PD_CLSF_ID = A1.PD_LCLSF_ID /*상품분류ID = 상품세분류ID*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CST_GD_ESTM_IZ A7 /*고객등급산정내역[AS-IS:LC7750P]*/ ON A7.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*데이터삭제여부*/ AND A7.CST_NO = A3.CNTR_CST_NO AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN A7.VL_STRT_DTM AND A7.VL_END_DTM LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_CCAM_BAS A8 /*위약금기본[AS-IS:LC1200P]*/ ON A8.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*데이터삭제여부*/ AND A8.TEMP_SAVE_YN = 'N' /*임시저장여부*/ AND A8.PD_CD = A1.BASE_PD_CD AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN A8.VL_STRT_DTM AND A8.VL_END_DTM LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_CLSF_BAS A9 /*상품분류기본-세분류[AS-IS:KA1100P]*/ ON A9.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*데이터삭제여부*/ AND A9.USE_YN = 'Y' /*사용여부*/ AND A9.PD_CLSF_ID = A1.PD_DCLSF_ID /*상품분류ID = 상품세분류ID*/ WHERE A1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*데이터삭제여부*/ AND A1.SELL_TP_CD = '2' AND A1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND A1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} ) T

SELECT CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ , SL_CL_YM /*매출마감년월[AS-IS:LCPAYY+LCPAYM]*/ , RENTAL_TN /*렌탈회차[AS-IS:LCRCNT]*/ FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ /*WELLS매출월마감내역[AS-IS:LC5000P]*/ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*데이터삭제여부*/ AND SL_CL_YM = SUBSTR(#{rqdt}, 0, 6) AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}

-- WELLS매출월마감내역 테이블 조회 (설치월의 렌탈일수 조회) SELECT NVL(RENTAL_DC, 0) AS RENTAL_DC /*설치월렌탈일수*/ FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ /*WELLS매출월마감내역[AS-IS:LC5000P]*/ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*데이터삭제여부*/ AND RENTAL_TN = 0 /*렌탈회차*/ AND IST_DTM IS NOT NULL /*설치일시*/ AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}

SELECT SUM(RENTAL_DSC_BOR_AMT) AS RENTAL_DSC_BOR_AMT , SUM(RSTL_BOR_AMT) AS RSTL_BOR_AMT FROM ( /* 리스 - 추가할인금액과 이자할인누계금액이 누적으로 관리되어 입력값_취소일자*/ SELECT NVL(SPMT_DSC_AMT + INT_DSC_AGG_AMT, 0) AS RENTAL_DSC_BOR_AMT /*렌탈료할인위약금액= 추가할인금액 + 이자할인누계금액*/ , 0 AS RSTL_BOR_AMT /*재약정위약금액*/ FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ /*WELLS매출월마감내역[AS-IS:LC5000P]*/ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*데이터삭제여부*/ AND SELL_TP_CD = '2' AND SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('22', '24', '25', '26') /*판매유형상세코드 22:리스, 24:환경리스, 25:장기할부, 26:환경할부*/ AND SL_CL_YM = SUBSTR(#{duedt}, 0, 6) AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} UNION ALL /* 렌탈 */ SELECT NVL(SUM(SPMT_DSC_AMT), 0) AS RENTAL_DSC_BOR_AMT /*렌탈료할인위약금액*/ , NVL(SUM(NOM_DSC_AMT), 0) AS RSTL_BOR_AMT /*재약정위약금액*/ FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ /*WELLS매출월마감내역[AS-IS:LC5000P]*/ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*데이터삭제여부*/ AND SELL_TP_CD = '2' AND SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('21', '23') /*판매유형상세코드 21:일반렌탈, 23:공유렌탈*/ AND SL_CL_YM < SUBSTR(#{duedt}, 0, 6) AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} GROUP BY CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN )

-- 사은품접수내역 테이블 조회 (특정 사은품 제공 여부를 확인하는 쿼리) SELECT COUNT(*) AS FGPT_DSB_CT /*사은품제공건수*/ FROM TB_SSCT_FGPT_RCP_IZ /*사은품접수내역[AS-IS:CW3100P]*/ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*데이터삭제여부*/ AND SPP_FSH_DTM IS NOT NULL /*배송완료일시*/ AND ( ( CNTR_UNIT_TP_CD = '010' AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} ) OR ( CNTR_UNIT_TP_CD = '020' AND DTL_CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND DTL_CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} ) ) AND FGPT_PD_CD = #{fgptPdCd} /*사은품상품코드*/

SELECT T.CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , T.CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ , CASE WHEN T.STPL_OVR_YN = 'Y' THEN T.RES_CHRAM_BOR_AMT ELSE 0 END AS RES_CHRAM_BOR_AMT /*잔여요금위약금액*/ , CASE WHEN T.STPL_OVR_YN = 'Y' THEN CASE WHEN /*----------------------------------------------------------------*/ /* 회차별변동 할인위약금액 산출 */ /* (상품기준금액 * 배송회차) - ((판매금액 - 할인금액) * 배송회차) */ /* 결국 할인금액을 산출하려는 산식임 */ /*----------------------------------------------------------------*/ T.RGLR_SPP_PRC_DV_CD = '3' THEN ( T.PD_BASE_AMT * T.TN_CHG_DSC_SPP_TN ) - ( ( T.SELL_AMT - T.DSC_AMT ) * T.TN_CHG_DSC_SPP_TN ) ELSE /*----------------------------------------------------------------*/ /* 회차별변동 외 할인위약금액 산출 */ /* ( (상품기준금액 -(판매금액-할인금액)) / 상품수량 ) * 배송회차 */ /* 결국 할인금액을 산출하려는 산식임 */ /*----------------------------------------------------------------*/ ( ( T.PD_BASE_AMT - ( T.SELL_AMT - T.DSC_AMT ) ) / T.PD_QTY ) * T.SPP_TN END ELSE 0 END AS DSC_BOR_AMT /*할인위약금액*/ FROM ( SELECT B.CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , B.CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ , B.SELL_TP_DTL_CD /*계약상세상태코드*/ , B.SL_DT /*매출일자*/ , B.STPL_PTRM /*약정기간*/ , B.PD_BASE_AMT /*상품기준금액*/ , B.SELL_AMT /*판매금액*/ , B.DSC_AMT /*할인금액*/ , B.PD_QTY /*상품수량*/ , CASE WHEN #{rqdt} >= CASE WHEN B.SL_DT IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(B.SL_DT, B.STPL_PTRM), 'yyyyMMdd') ELSE '' END THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS STPL_OVR_YN /*약정초과여부*/ , CASE WHEN B.SL_DT IS NOT NULL THEN TO_DATE(B.SL_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(#{rqdt}, 'YYYYMMDD') ELSE 0 END AS UES_DC /*사용일수*/ /*---------------------------------------------------*/ /* 잔여요금 위약금액 산식 - 캡슐 */ /* ( 판매금액 - 할인금액 * ( 경과개월수 - 1 ) ) / 10 */ /*---------------------------------------------------*/ , TRUNC( ( B.SELL_AMT - B.DSC_AMT * ( CASE WHEN B.SL_DT IS NOT NULL THEN CASE WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(B.SL_DT, #{rqdt}) > 0 THEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(B.SL_DT, #{rqdt}) - 1 ELSE MONTHS_BETWEEN(B.SL_DT, #{rqdt}) END ELSE 0 END ) ) / 10, 1 ) AS RES_CHRAM_BOR_AMT /*잔여요금위약금액*/ , B.RGLR_SPP_PRC_DV_CD /*정기배송 구성유형*/ , B.RENTAL_TN /*렌탈회차*/ , B.SV_PRD /*서비스주기*/ /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/ /* 회차변동 배송회차 산출 */ /* 1) 렌탈차월 = 0 -> 배송회차 = 0 */ /* 2-1) 렌탈차월 - 1 / 배송주기(TO-BE 서비스주기)의 몫 = 0 AND 경과개월(취소일자와 매출일자) / 배송주기(TO-BE 서비스주기)의 몫 != 0 */ /* -> 렌탈차월 - 1 / 배송주기(TO-BE 서비스주기) */ /* 2-2) 2-1이 아니면 -> 렌탈차월 - 1 / 배송주기(TO-BE 서비스주기) + 1 */ /* 결국 취소월의 배송여부를 판단하여 배송회차를 산출하는 로직임 */ /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/ , CASE WHEN B.RENTAL_TN = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CASE WHEN MOD(B.RENTAL_TN - 1, B.SV_PRD) = 0 AND MOD(CASE WHEN B.SL_DT IS NOT NULL THEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(#{duedt}, B.SL_DT) ELSE 0 END, B.SV_PRD) != 0 THEN ( B.RENTAL_TN - 1 ) / B.SV_PRD ELSE ( ( B.RENTAL_TN - 1 ) / B.SV_PRD ) + 1 END END AS TN_CHG_DSC_SPP_TN /*회차변동배송회차*/ /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/ /* 회차변동 외 배송회차 산출 */ /* 1) 렌탈차월 = 0 -> 배송회차 = 0 */ /* 2-1) 렌탈차월 -
